queries.drop: IF OBJECT_ID('enrollment_campaign') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP VIEW enrollment_campaign END
queries.create: SELECT r.title AS 'Role' , l.label AS 'Language' , u.first_name AS 'First Name' , u.last_name AS 'Last Name' , e.country AS 'Country' , e.city AS 'City' , e.school_score + SUM(ehs.score) AS 'Total Score' , f.default_title AS 'Faculty' , '' AS 'Status' FROM users u JOIN langs l ON l.id = u.lang_id JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id JOIN enrollees e ON u.id = e.user_id JOIN enrollees_has_subjects ehs ON e.id = ehs.enrollee_id JOIN faculties_has_enrollees fhe ON e.id = fhe.enrollee_id JOIN faculties f ON f.id = fhe.faculty_id GROUP BY r.title , l.label , u.id , u.first_name , u.last_name , e.country , e.city , e.school_score , f.id , f.default_title ORDER BY f.id ASC , 'Total Score' DESC
